Package it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105053.model

Class LedgerMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105053.model.LedgerMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ledger
    public class LedgerMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements Ledger
    This class implements the interface Ledger and has the responsibility to manage all data of the application. It has the responsibility to create and remove accounts, create and remove tags and add and remove transactions. It is also possible to view the entire list of stored accounts, tags, transactions and movements as well as a list of all transactions and accounts that satisfy a particular predicate.
    Author:
    Tommaso Catervi

        public void addAccount​(AccountType accountType,
                       java.lang.String name,
                       double initialBalance)
        Allows to create and add a new Account to the accountList. The value of the ID field is generated by the class Indexer.

        Parameters:
        accountType - the value used to set the accountType field in the Account.
        name - the value used to set the name field in the Account.
        initialBalance - the value used to set the initialBalance field in the Account.

        name - the new name to set.
        initialBalance - the new initial balance to set.

      • removeAccount

        public void removeAccount​(Account account)
        Allows to remove an Account from the accountList as long as the given parameter is not null and is contained in the accountList. When an Account is removed, all movements associated with that Account are removed from the movementsList and from the movements list of all transactions. All transactions resulting with zero movements after this computation are removed from the transactions list.
        Specified by:
        removeAccount in interface Ledger
        Parameters:
        account - the Account to be removed.

      • getAccounts

        public java.util.List<Account> getAccounts()
        Getter method for the list accountList which contains all the accounts associated with this LedgerMenu.
        Specified by:
        getAccounts in interface Ledger
        Returns:
        the list of all the accounts of the LedgerMenu.

      • getAccounts

        public java.util.List<Account> getAccounts​(java.util.function.Predicate<Account> p)
        Returns the list accountList after filtering it according to the Predicate p.
        Specified by:
        getAccounts in interface Ledger
        Parameters:
        p - the predicate the accounts must satisfy.
        Returns:
        the filtered accountList.

      • addTransaction

        public void addTransaction​(Transaction transaction)
        Allows to add a new Transaction to the transactionList as long as the given parameter is not null and does not already exist in the transactionList. When a Transaction is added, all its movements are added to the Account they are associated with and to the movementsList.
        Specified by:
        addTransaction in interface Ledger
        Parameters:
        transaction - the Transaction to add.

      • removeTransaction

        public void removeTransaction​(Transaction t)
        Allows to remove a Transaction from the transactionList as long as the given parameter is not null and is contained in the transactionList. When a Transaction is removed from the transactionList, each Movement associated with that Transaction is removed from the movementList of the accounts it is associated with. Also each Movement in the movementsList associated with that Transaction is removed.
        Specified by:
        removeTransaction in interface Ledger
        Parameters:
        t - the Transaction to remove.

      • getTransactions

        public java.util.List<Transaction> getTransactions()
        Getter method for the list transactionList which contains all the transactions associated with this LedgerMenu.
        Specified by:
        getTransactions in interface Ledger
        Returns:
        the list of all transactions of this LedgerMenu.

      • getTransactions

        Returns the list transactionList after filtering it according to the Predicate p.
        Specified by:
        getTransactions in interface Ledger
        Parameters:
        p - the predicate the transactions must satisfy.
        Returns:
        the filtered transactionList.

        public void addTag​(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String description)

      • removeTag

        public void removeTag​(Tag tag)
        Allows to remove a Tag from the tagList as long as the given parameter is not null and is contained in the tagList. The given Tag is also removed from all transactions and movements.
        Specified by:
        removeTag in interface Ledger
        Parameters:
        tag - the Tag to remove.
